comments.body:
Due to diff exception handling for IllegalArgumentException at the call sides, the results are not same https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/28592/files#diff-79dd276be45ede6f34e24ad7005b0a7cR801-R806
cc @cloud-fan
it's OK. it's already the case in 2.4

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +922,926 @@
-- !query
select from_unixtime(54321, 'QQQQQ')
-- !query schema
struct<from_unixtime(CAST(54321 AS BIGINT), QQQQQ):string>

comments.body: can we test the optional case? `to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]')`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +491,495 @@
-- !query
select to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12.123', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]')
-- !query schema
struct<to_timestamp('2019-10-06 10:11:12.123', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[.SSSSSS]'):timestamp>
